description: Erection of a single storey rear infill, rear and side extension, installation of matching replacement first floor front glazed doors/ windows and first and ground floor rear windows and repair of the existing front door glazing to the house.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1224 - 01 - 02; 1224 - 01 - 03  Received:  24 January 2023;  1224 - 02 - 06  Received:  23 January 2023;  1224 - 00 - 01; 1224 - 00 - 02; 1224 - 00 - 03; 1224 - 01 - 01; 1224 - 01 - 04; 1224 - 01 - 05; 1224 - 01 - 06; 1224 - 01 - 07; 1224 - 01 - 09; 1224 - 01- 10; 1224 - 01 - 11; 1224 - 01 - 12; 1224 - 02 - 01; 1224 - 02 - 02; 1224 - 02 - 03; 1224 - 02 - 04; 1224 - 02 - 05; 1224 - 02 - 07; 1224 - 02 - 09; 1224 - 02 - 10; 1224 - 02 - 11; 1224 - 02 - 12  Received:  09 January 2023) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The replacement front glazed doors/ windows and first floor rear windows to the original house hereby approved shall have matching sizes and designs to the existing windows and glazed doors that they would replace.
Condition : 5 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the single storey rear infill, rear and side extension hereby approved.
